Intellexa

An AI club run by the students and faculty of Rajalakshmi Engineering College,Thandalam

Kickstart!

07 Jan 2019

As a part of the club initiative, a deep learning workshop was conducted for the second year students of CSE and IT departments.It was a four-day workshop which commenced on 3rd March 2019 and concluded on the 7th March 2019.There were a total of 23 participants.
